ground_truth_reviews.comment: This method contains an excessive level of nesting, with five nested levels of indentation. This significantly harms readability and makes the logic difficult to follow. Consider refactoring this to use guard clauses and a flatter structure to improve maintainability. A simple loop with a single 'if' check would be much clearer.

title: feat: Add validation checks to post retrieval
body: This change adds several validation checks to the `get_post_by_id` method to ensure data integrity before returning a post. It now verifies the database isn't empty, the post object exists, and the ID is of the correct type.
